entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
